mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ctdish ORDER BY DishWndID DESC, DishID DESC

Insert into ctdish (ctdish.DishWndID, ctdish.DishTypeID,ctdish.DishName, ctdish.DishPrice,ctdish.DishDate, ctdish.DishRecmd,ctdish.DishKeep, ctdish.DishSale,ctdish.DishInDate, ctdish.DishNote,ctdish.DishDelete) values (#{dishWndID}, #{dishName},#{dishPrice}, #{dishDate},#{dishRecmd}, #{dishKeep},#{dishSale}, #{dishInState},#{dishNote}, #{dishDelete})
